name: Career counselling
details: Career counselling is especially useful if you aren’t quite sure which direction to head in. Students will get proper direction from experts of our university.

name: Campus healthcare
details: We offer a student medical service on campus with flexible appointments, telephone consultations and healthcare professionals dedicated to assisting students.

name: Lost and Found
details: To help you maximize your chances of success, UvA offers networking workshops teaching students how to approach professionals both online and offline,

name: Student counsellors
details: Student counsellors can help you cope with any aspect of student life, whether you’re concerned about exams, finances, health issues, homesickness or anything else.

name: Language center
details: Having an extra language on your CV will improve your employability and increase your chances of finding work after you graduate.

name: Student gym
details: UvA’s gym offers individual training, classes, a fitness test, and has centers across UvA’s various campus locations.

name: Study training and workshops
details: UvA’s ‘study skills workshop for international master’s students’ is specifically designed to teach international postgraduate students

name: Student Financial Services
details: There are a variety of types of financial assistance that help students pay for college, including loans, scholarships and grants. you and after your educational experience at NMC.

name: Financial Aid
details: NMC’s financial aid programs are designed to help students pay their educational expenses. Financial aid is meant student and family payment responsibilities.

name: Academic Advising
details: The Academic & Career Advising Center is here to help you from the beginning of your journey all the way through graduation, certification, or whatever your goal may be.

name: Networking training and events
